title: Lagspikes in game?
body:
Hi.

Recently in game, and only in league of legends, I get lagspikes with the champions I play. In the beginning at fountain I can walk out of that "wall" and my champion starts.. i guess.. lag spiking? Moves from one position to another even when im just walking a straight line. It's like a flash.

Any ideas on how I can fix this? This is the first time it's happened.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing some big delays and potentially some *Packet Loss* causing the symptoms you're seeing. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it will confirm that your local network settings are compatible with League and aren't contributing to the issues you're seeing.

Let me know if this caused any changes for you.
